eu_initiatives:
I have represented Ireland's industrial base in the European Commission for Artificial Intelligence in January 2018. 
Also members of the AI Ireland consortium have engaged on behalf of their companies with the Comission
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
I have represented Ireland's industrial base in the European Commission for Artificial Intelligence in January 2018. 
I hhave also developed Ireland's value proposition in conjunction with our industrial base of multinational and Irish companies as well as academic institutions across the Island of Ireland. 
I have with other government agencies developed a National Masters in Artificial Intelligence.
goals__remit: Our organisation is soon to be the largest innovation Campus in Ireland. We will be home to 1000 innovators, innovating across multiple technologies and themes.
